Search is noindex and excluded from sitemap; transactional/auth routes excluded.
Template does not define application-level redirects; verify infra/CDN redirects separately.

Account area removed from Basic Template.
Indexable pages rely on default index,follow (no meta robots) unless explicitly set.
Needs explicit policy for filtered/sorted URLs (noindex vs canonical).
Pagination is "load more"; audit expects canonical/prev/next strategy if using paginated URLs.

notes: Canonical tags verified on key routes; confirm all CMS-driven routes.

check: Canonical tags are self-referencing on unique pages

notes: Canonicals are absolute URLs derived from NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL.

Depends on NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL and infrastructure (www vs non-www).

notes: Many images have alt; full coverage requires crawl.

notes: Several core pages render with Suspense fallbacks / client-only sections; verify no-JS content.

Mix of server/client components; needs systematic review.

Needs Lighthouse/trace to confirm render-blocking JS.
